title: Powers and duties of the administrator, and inspectors
context: ยง486-5 Powers and duties of the administrator, and inspectors. The administrator may delegate any of the administrator&rsquo;s authority, powers and duties to the inspectors or other measurement standards personnel when such delegation is deemed necessary for the efficient and effective enforcement of the respective parts of this chapter. [L 1988, c 156, pt of ยง3; gen ch 1992]
